price: Ìbùkún ni fún Ẹni tí Ó ṣe àwọn ibùsọ̀ ìràwọ̀ sínú sánmọ̀. Ó tún ṣe òòrùn àti òṣùpá ní ìmọ́lẹ̀ sínú rẹ̀.
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجٗا وَقَمَرٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī jaʿala fī al-samāi burūjan wajaʿala fīhā sirājan waqamaran munīran
